52.name: STR
52.Description: Recovers the HP of a spirit within a 15m radius by 100% and removes all magical debuffs from it.

40.name: STR
40.Description: Spends 10% of own HP to restore the MP of a targeted ally within 25m by 3500.

52.name: STR
52.Description: Spends 10% of own HP to restore the MP of a targeted ally within 25m by 4000.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Increases your spirit's Physical Attack and Magic Attack by 40%, Physical, All Elemental Defenses by 10%, Magic Boost by 400, Speed by 30%, Magic Accuracy by 1000, and Accuracy by 1000 if it is within a 25m radius for 5m.

25.name: STR
25.Description: Removes up to 3 buffs from the target, inflicting 189 damage for the first buff removed and a further 189 damage per each additional buff.

54.name: STR
54.Description:
Reduces the maximum HP and maximum MP of a target within a 25m radius by 1500 each for 1 min.
It can be removed with a Dispel Magical Debuff skill.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Reduces the Attack Speed of target within 25m radius for 30s. Increases targets casting time for magical skills and decreases All Elemental Defense by 150 and Magic Resistance by 100. This effect can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills.

40.name: STR
40.Description:
Puts group members within 20m of you into basic stealth for 30s, during which they cannot move.
Unable to use during battle.

31.name: STR
31.Description: For 1m, there is a 10% chance of the caster and the group members within a 20m radius inflicting additional 35 damage on enemies with every attack.

37.name: STR
37.Description: For 1m, there is a 10% chance of the caster and the group members within a 20m radius inflicting additional 40 damage on enemies with every attack.

49.name: STR
49.Description: For 1m, there is a 10% chance of the caster and the group members within a 20m radius inflicting additional 52 damage on enemies with every attack.

55.name: STR
55.Description: For 1m, there is a 10% chance of the caster and the group members within a 20m radius inflicting additional 58 damage on enemies with every attack.

55.name: STR
55.Description: Decreases Physical Def by 1000, All Elemental Defense by 200, and Magic Resistance by 200 for a target within a 25m radius for 30s.

50.name: STR
50.Description: Inflicts 511 earth damage to a target within a 25m radius, and deals periodic 445 damage every 3s for 12s.

53.name: STR
53.Description: Inflicts 554 earth damage to a target within a 25m radius, and deals periodic 482 damage every 3s for 12s.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Removes up to 3 buffs from the target, inflicts 400 damage for the first buff removed, and inflicts a further 400 damage per each additional buff removed. The target also receives 100 damage every 3 sec for 30 sec. It can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills.

48.name: STR
48.Description: Removes up to 3 buffs from the target, inflicts 427 damage for the first buff removed, and inflicts a further 427 damage per each additional buff removed. The target also receives 104 damage every 3 sec for 30 sec. It can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills.

51.name: STR
51.Description: Removes up to 3 buffs from the target, inflicts 452 damage for the first buff removed, and inflicts a further 452 damage per each additional buff removed. The target also receives 110 damage every 3 sec for 30 sec. It can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills.

54.name: STR
54.Description: Removes up to 3 buffs from the target, inflicts 491 damage for the first buff removed, and inflicts a further 491 damage per each additional buff removed. The target also receives 120 damage every 3 sec for 30 sec. It can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills.

34.name: STR
34.Description:
Commands spirits to use their respective magical buffs on allies within a 15m radius of themselves.

Water Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy and Magical Resistance
Wind Spirit: Increases Accuracy and Evasion Rate
Earth Spirit: Recovers HP. Removes Physical and Mental Debuffs
Fire Spirit: Increases Physical Attack and reflects damage
Magma Spirit: Recovers HP and increases Physical Attack
Tempest Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy, Magical Resistance, Accuracy, and Evasion Rate.

55.name: STR
55.Description: Commands the spirit to use its debuff skills. The spirit possesses the target and puts it to sleep, reducing Attack Speed and increasing all elemental defense of the target before disappearing.

48.name: STR
48.Description: Commands the spirit to use its protection magic. The spirit receives all the damage in place of the caster.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Summons 4 Energies of Wind to inflict wind damage to a target within a 25m radius.

48.name: STR
48.Description: Summons 4 Energies of Wind to inflict wind damage to a target within a 25m radius.

51.name: STR
51.Description: Summons 4 Energies of Wind to inflict wind damage to a target within a 25m radius.

54.Description: Summons 4 Energies of Wind to inflict wind damage to a target within a 25m radius.

54.name: STR
54.Description: Summons 4 Energies of Wind to inflict wind damage to a target within a 25m radius.

52.name: STR
52.Description: Forces a target within 25m to fall asleep for 20s and increases All Elemental Defense. The duration decreases if the target is a player.

50.name: STR
50.Description: Commands the spirit to attack. Each spirit has an element-specific strike skill.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Commands the spirit to channel its HP into an attack spell. Each spirit has an element-specific skill that deals damage in an area of affect. It deals an additional damage if the target is an Asmodian or a Balaur

50.name: STR
50.Description: Commands the spirit to consume its HP in a magical elemental attack dealing area effect damage. It deals additional damage if the target is an Asmodian or a Balaur.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Commands the spirit to channel its HP into an attack spell. Each spirit has an element-specific skill that deals damage in an area of affect. It deals an additional damage if the target is an Elyos or a Balaur.

50.name: STR
50.Description: Commands the spirit to consume its HP in a magical elemental attack dealing area effect damage. It deals additional damage if the target is an Elyos or a Balaur.

45.name: STR
45.Description: Deals 357 magical wind damage to a target within 25m of you, and deals a further 311 damage every 2s for 8s.

51.name: STR
51.Description: Deals 395 magical wind damage to a target within 25m of you, and deals a further 344 damage every 2s for 8s.

22.name: STR
22.Description: You draw the Enmity of a target within 15m that is currently focused on your spirit.

37.name: STR
37.Description: Transforms a target within a 15m radius of you into Fire Spirits for 15s-18s, and strikes them with fear and reduces their Movement Speed. The duration decreases if the target is a player.
